Package org.jcvi.jillion.fasta

This package contains classes for dealing with fasta data.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FastaDataStore<S,T extends Sequence<S>,F extends FastaRecord<S,T>,D extends DataStore<T>>
    FastaDataStore is a marker interface for a DataStore for FastaRecords.
    FastaParser
    FastaParser is an interface that will parse a FASTA formatted structure and call the appropriate visit methods on the given FastaVisitor.
    FastaRecord<S,T extends Sequence<S>>
    FastaRecord is an interface for interacting with a single FASTA record.
    FastaRecordVisitor
    FastaRecordVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single fasta record inside of a fasta file.
    FastaVisitor
    FastaVisitor is a visitor interface to visit components of a single fasta file.
    FastaVisitorCallback
    FastaVisitorCallback is a callback mechanism for the FastaVisitor instance to communicate with the parser that is parsing the fasta data.
    FastaVisitorCallback.FastaVisitorMemento
    FastaVisitorMemento is a marker interface that FastaParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its fasta file in order to revisit portions of the fasta file.
    FastaWriter<S,T extends Sequence<S>,F extends FastaRecord<S,T>>
    FastaWriter is a interface that handles how FastaRecords are written.
    FastaWriter.FastaRecordAdapter<S,T extends Sequence<S>,F extends FastaRecord<S,T>>  
    SplitFastaWriter.DeconvolveFastaRecordWriterFactory<K,T>
    Functional interface to create new FastaWriter instances.
    SplitFastaWriter.FastaRecordWriterFactory<T>
    Functional interface to create new FastaWriter instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFastaRecordVisitor  
    FastaFileParser
    FastaFileParser will parse a single fasta encoded file and call the appropriate visitXXX methods on the given FastaVisitor.
    SplitFastaWriter
    Utility class that creates FastaWriter instances that split the FastaRecord objects being written out over several different output files.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.fasta Description

This package contains classes for dealing with fasta data. Sub-packages are used to handle certain types of fasta data (nucleotides, qualities etc).
